headline: Nucor Corporation (NUE): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Nucor Corporation on r/Valueinvesting by ahlornjtvn139. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NUE. Nucor Corporation’s share was trading at $174.39 as of January 16th. NUE’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.49 and 15.22 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Nucor Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of steel and […]

headline: Nucor (NUE) Is Up 5.1% After Mixed Analyst Revisions and Brighter 2026 Backlog Signals - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: Recently, analysts adjusted their views on Nucor, with mixed rating changes but generally improving earnings estimates ahead of its late-January 2026 results announcement. The combination of cautious commentary on near-term guidance and stronger 2026 backlogs in areas like data centers and infrastructure highlights a complex but improving demand picture. Next, we’ll explore how this more optimistic earnings outlook, despite softer near-term guidance, may influence Nucor’s existing investment...
